metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12675 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a missing check for multidimensional data was found in coders/mat.c, leading to a memory leak in the function ReadImage in MagickCore/constitute.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0110-Memory-leak-in-mat-coder-upstream-616.patch in unstable 0287-CVE-2017-12675-Fix-missing-validation-in-ReadMATImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
